posts.message:
بشرة سارة لكل محبى التكنولوجيا و متابعي موزيلا فى محافظة الدقهلية , بعد الظروف السيئة التى واجهت موزيلا مصر فى المنصورة و اللى إضطررنا آسفين بسببها إلغاء جولتنا فى محافظة الدقهلية.
موزيلا مصر وعدت إنها تسعى لتعويضكم عما حدث و حرصاً منها على ثقتكم الغالية ,فموزيلا مصر بتتيح الفرصة لحضراتكم مشاركتنا فى جولتها بمحافظة القاهرة و سوف نكون سعداء جدا بوجودكم و مشاركتكم لنا . 

موزيلا مصر هتوفر أتوبيسات نقل خاصة من المنصورة إلى القاهرة ، و كل المطلوب هو التسجيل في الاستمارة http://bit.ly/1xpb73U

مين قال جاى ؟
في انتظاركم :)

posts.message: I hope the following is appropriate for this group. I'm looking to get advice on an ideal Wordpress development environment/workflow. After some years of working inefficiently, and sometimes recklessly (often working directly on live sites, sometimes finding sites broken several steps in, and then resorting to backups, sometimes at a server level, and trying to remember the steps I took and want to renew), I'm trying to refine a better setup: Vagrant (under VirtualBox on OSX) for local WP development (initially using the VVV configuration, though I'm looking into other configurations) --> GIT for version control (using Tower for OSX: still learning my way around this one) --> Codekit to keep browsers automatically refreshed --> Beanstalk from Tower to push and pull branches to and from local to the production server (I'm looking into running all my sites from a single git repository, with domains segmented out in branches, so I can keep to the free, one repository Beanstalk plan) --> WP Sync DB Master plugin (a free fork of the premium plugin WP Migrate DB Pro that works perfectly for migrations and backups) to pull and push databases between local and remote without having to edit databases --> Command line cache purge for Cloudfare and MaxCDN where necessary (still working on this) ---> Automated backup to Dropbox from the production server using BackWPup plugin. I'm not there yet on all the above, but this is where I'm heading. I'd be very appreciative of any input, or alternative suggestions.
